original: Bernström, Nils Gustaf, apotekare, köpman, Göteborg, f. 15/1/77 i Gbg av gr0’ssh. Andreas B. o. Anna Sundström. G. 14 m. Gunborg Odencrants. Barn: Lars Erik f. 15, Gustaf 16, Peter Andreas 18, Anne Jacquette 20, Agneta 23, Märta Katarina 28. ■— Farm. stud. 97, stud. v. univ. i Mar-burg 02, apot:ex. 03. Chef f. Kronans Droghand. A-B i Gbg, Sthlm o. Malmö sed. 07. Ordf. i styr. f. Gbgs Bank, v. ordf. i Gbgs Inteckn. Garanti A-B, v. ordf. i A-B Motala Verkst., styr :led. o. kas’saförv. i Gbgs stadsbibi. KV02kl, RNO, LVVS.
translated: Bernström, Nils Gustaf, pharmacist, merchant, Gothenburg, born on January 15th, 1877 in Gothenburg, son of merchant Andreas B. and Anna Sundström. Married for 14 years to Gunborg Odencrants. Children: Lars Erik born in 1915, Gustaf in 1916, Peter Andreas in 1918, Anne Jacquette in 1920, Agneta in 1923, and Märta Katarina in 1928. He studied pharmacy in 1897 and later at the University of Marburg in 1902, where he passed his pharmacy exam in 1903. He became the head of Kronans Droghand. A-B in Gothenburg, Stockholm and Malmö since 1907. He was the chairman of the board of Gothenburg's Bank, vice-chairman of Gothenburg's Inteckn. Garanti A-B, vice-chairman of A-B Motala Verkst., director and cashier of Gothenburg's stadsbibi. He received the Royal Order of Vasa, Litteris et Artibus and the Order of the Sword.
